Name: Redacted Epilogue
About the game: In the highly anticipated follow-up to the comic book 'REDACTED: Revival' by REJECT Comics, follow the journey of the former Black Ops experimental soldier known by the codename 'The Black Anvil' in this story rich, single-player 2.5D RPG turn-based combat. Learn about what unfolds after the events of the comic, as the Black Anvil is faced with saving civilization from a new threat. Featuring the original 'REDACTED: Revival' comic book included in the installation folder of the game's local files.
